com.mambu.apisdk.services
Class ClientsService

java.lang.Object
  com.mambu.apisdk.services.ClientsService

public class ClientsService
extends java.lang.Object

Service class which handles API operations like getting and creating clients and groups of clients

ipenciuc

createClient

public com.mambu.clients.shared.model.ClientExpanded createClient(com.mambu.clients.shared.model.ClientExpanded clientDetails)
                                                           throws MambuApiException
Create a new client (expanded) using ClientExpanded object and sending it as a Json api. This API allows creating Client with more details, including creating custom fields. Note: since Mambu3.2 this is the API that must be used for creating Clients. Non-json APIs for creating a client could be deprecated in a future

Parameters:
clientDetails -
Returns:
Note: only the basic details for the custom fields are returned on success. To get full details a user must invoke getClientDetails() after the client was created.
Throws:
MambuApiException

getClientsByBranchOfficerState

public java.util.List<com.mambu.clients.shared.model.Client> getClientsByBranchOfficerState(java.lang.String branchId,
                                                                                            java.lang.String creditOfficerUserName,
                                                                                            java.lang.String clientState,
                                                                                            java.lang.String offset,
                                                                                            java.lang.String limit)
                                                                                     throws MambuApiException
Get Clients by branch id, credit officer, clientState

Parameters:
branchId - the ID of the Client's branch
creditOfficerUserName - the username of the credit officer to whom the CLients are assigned to
clientState - the desired state of a Client to filter on (eg: ACTIVE)
Returns:
the list of Clients matching these parameters
Throws:
MambuApiException
